Package com.hexaforce.warzone.models

Class Map

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.models.Map
public class Map extends Object
This class serves as a central hub for managing various aspects of maps, including continents and countries.

    • getContinentIDs

      Returns:
      List of continent IDs.

    • getCountryIDs

      public List<Integer> getCountryIDs()
      Retrieve a list of all country IDs in the map.
      Returns:
      List of country IDs.

    • checkCountries

      public void checkCountries()
      Display information about the existing countries, including their IDs, continent IDs, and neighboring countries.

    • validate

      public Boolean validate() throws InvalidMap
      Validate the entire map for correctness.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value indicating map validity.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Exception if the map is invalid.

    • checkForNullObjects

      public Boolean checkForNullObjects() throws InvalidMap
      Perform a null check on objects within the map.
      Returns:
      A Boolean indicating whether the check passed.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if there are corresponding invalid conditions.

    • checkContinentConnectivity

      public Boolean checkContinentConnectivity() throws InvalidMap
      Check the internal connectivity of all continents.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value indicating whether all continents are connected.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if any continent is not connected.

    • subGraphConnectivity

      public boolean subGraphConnectivity(Continent continent) throws InvalidMap
      Check the internal connectivity of a continent.
      Parameters:
      continent - The continent being checked.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value indicating whether the continent is connected.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - indicating which country is not connected.

    • dfsSubgraph

      public void dfsSubgraph(Country visitedCountry, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> visitedCountryMap, Continent continent)
      Apply Depth-First Search (DFS) to the subgraph of a continent.
      Parameters:
      visitedCountry - The currently visited country.
      visitedCountryMap - A HashMap of visited Boolean values.
      continent - The continent being checked for connectivity.

    • checkCountryConnectivity

      public boolean checkCountryConnectivity() throws InvalidMap
      Check the connectivity of countries within the map.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value indicating whether all countries are connected.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - pointing out countries that are not connected.

    • dfsCountry

      public void dfsCountry(Country initialCountry) throws InvalidMap
      Apply Depth-First Search (DFS) iteratively starting from the specified node.
      Parameters:
      initialCountry - The first country to visit.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Exception.

    • getAdjacentCountry

      public List<Country> getAdjacentCountry(Country country) throws InvalidMap
      Retrieve the list of adjacent country objects.
      Parameters:
      country - The country for which adjacent countries are requested.
      Returns:
      A list of adjacent country objects.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - pointing out countries that are not connected.
      InvalidMap - Exception.

    • getCountry

      public Country getCountry(Integer countryId)
      Retrieve a Country object based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      countryId - The ID of the desired country object.
      Returns:
      The matching country object, or null if not found.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The matching country object, or null if not found.

      Returns:
      The matching continent object, or null if not found.

    • addContinent

      public void addContinent(String continentName, Integer controlValue) throws InvalidMap
      Add a new continent to the map.
      Parameters:
      continentName - The name of the continent to be added.
      controlValue - The control value of the continent to be added.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if an invalid addition is attempted.

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent(String p_continentName) throws InvalidMap
      Remove a continent from the map.

      This operation includes the removal of the specified continent and all the countries it contains, as well as their associated data within the map.

      Parameters:
      p_continentName - The name of the continent to be removed.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if an invalid removal is attempted.

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry(String p_countryName, String p_continentName) throws InvalidMap
      Add a new country to the map.
      Parameters:
      p_countryName - The name of the country to be added.
      p_continentName - The name of the continent in which the country is to be added.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if an invalid addition is attempted.

    • removeCountry

      public void removeCountry(String p_countryName) throws InvalidMap
      Remove a country from the map.
      Parameters:
      p_countryName - The name of the country to be removed.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if an invalid removal is attempted.

    • addCountryNeighbour

      public void addCountryNeighbour(String countryName, String neighbourName) throws InvalidMap
      Add a neighboring country to a specified country.
      Parameters:
      countryName - The name of the country whose neighbors are to be updated.
      neighbourName - The name of the country to be added as a neighbor.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if an invalid neighbor pair is provided.

    • removeCountryNeighbour

      public void removeCountryNeighbour(String countryName, String neighbourName) throws InvalidMap
      Remove a neighboring country from a specified country.
      Parameters:
      countryName - The name of the country whose neighbors are to be updated.
      neighbourName - The name of the country to be removed as a neighbor.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if an invalid neighbor pair is provided.

    • updateNeighbourCountries

      public void updateNeighbourCountries(Integer countryId)
      Remove a specific country as a neighbor from all associated countries within the continents (used during the deletion of a country object).
      Parameters:
      countryId - The ID of the country to be removed as a neighbor.

    • removeCountryNeighboursFromAll

      public void removeCountryNeighboursFromAll(Integer countryID)
      Remove a specific country as a neighbor from all associated countries within the map's country list (used during the deletion of a country object).
      Parameters:
      countryID - The ID of the country to be removed as a neighbor.
